subject: EDERAL BUREAU OF INVESTIGATION
body:
EDERAL BUREAU OF INVESTIGATION (FBI)
Office of the Director General
  Division Federal Government Office Address: 935 Pennsylvania Ave NW, Washington, DC 20535 ,United States
HELLO  
This is to inform you that you have been compensated by the United States Government with a sum of $50 Million Dollars Which has been received in my office yesterday   I am sorry to inform you lately because I was very busy.
You are to choose how you want your fund to be received
(1) Bank to Bank wire Transfer
(2) Cash delivery
(3) Cheque
. This is your fund consignment CODE (LE6W361R) keep it secret for security purpose.
Also send you current home address
Thanks  
And please do not forget to report any scam related issues to the FBI
Thanks
FBI Director
fbido60@gmail.com
Dont forget to contact me with this Email 
fbido60@gmail.com

subject: Re: EDERAL BUREAU OF INVESTIGATION
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the information you have provided. Can you please provide more details about how I have been chosen to receive this sum of money? I want to make sure that everything is legitimate and secure.

Also, could you explain the process for each option of receiving the funds - Bank to Bank wire transfer, Cash delivery, and Cheque? Which one would be the safest and most convenient method?

I understand the importance of keeping my fund code secret for security purposes. Rest assured, I will not share it with anyone.

Regarding my current home address, may I ask why it is needed? Is there a specific reason for this?

Thank you once again for contacting me. I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Juan
